ygData.subject: Re: Bards in Mistmoore
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Eh, I find this really really hard to believe, seeing as the mobs simply don t exist in that zone. If you could go past the zone border, you d find a dead
ygData.messageBody:
> Heck, I've even had something cast at me through the walls
> while I was in Lesser Faydark standing right next to the
> Mistmoore zone. I know this is supposed to be impossible, and
> I wouldn't have believed it if it hadn't happened to me.
> Something with a Mistmoore-ish name behind the walls tagged me
> with tashan and a DD. I moved away from the zone and it
> stopped casting at me.

Eh, I find this really really hard to believe, seeing as the mobs simply
don't exist in that zone. If you could go past the zone border, you'd find
a dead end (I have friends who have done this when running from a train
and died -- bug). Also, if these mobs did exist, surely we'd hear them
buff themselves. Additionally, they'd showup on track.

More likely is that some of the fae drakes got stuck in the path to the
mistmoore zone. Several of them are enchanters/wizards and can even charm.
There's a whole mass of them right at the start of the path and I
frequently see them along the path.
